means: 迷上戏剧表演的；一心想当演员的

sentence.Network_en: His ten - year old daughter is completely stage - struck.
sentence.Network_cn: 他那十岁的女儿想当演员都入迷了.

sentence.Network_en: Several hundred workers struck in sympathy with their colleagues.
sentence.Network_cn: 几百名工人罢工以声援他们的同事。

sentence.Network_en: I struck the ball cleanly and my shot was on target.
sentence.Network_cn: 我干脆利落地击球，命中了目标。

entry.tran: 迷上戏剧表演的;一心想当演员的
entry.def: Someone who is stage-struck is fascinated by the theatre and wants to become an actor or actress.

means.word_mean: 1. infatuated with or enthralled by the theater especially the desire to act

auth_sentence.content: The ambulance service said he was struck with birdshot.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: The ambulance service said he was struck with birdshot.

auth_sentence.content: But Radiohead should be so lucky at this stage.
